document_data.name: Imphras Heltharn III
document_data.mainbody: '''Imphras Heltharn III''' was a crown prince of [[Impiltur]].
document_data.Relationships: Imphras was the eldest son of King [[Lashilmbrar]] the Sly. His mother was named [[Thelmara Rorntarn]]. His younger brother was [[Rilimbrar]], who would become the next king.
document_data.History: Imphras III was born in [[1276 DR]] but was assassinated at the age of eighteen years in a staged bandit attack on the king's summer residence by Imphras' step-cousin Prince [[Thaum]], which also slew his father, the king. This made his younger brother the new king and marked Thaum as the next crown prince.
